description:
Nutstore is a cloud storage service that lets you access your photos, videos, and documents anywhere and anytime. After you install Nutstore on your computer, any file you save to your Nutstore will automatically synchronize to all your Mac, PC and the Nutstore website. WebDAV protocol is well supported。

Initiative feature, Favorite Folder, is designed for offline access. All files in the favorite folder will be updated from LAN desktop client, fast and automatically. Then You can access these favorite files anywhere even without network.


Nutstore allows you sync any folder. Organize files as your wish and share with friends easily. Nutstore also has other great features: incremental backup, history version restoring, share access control and etc.


With the Nutstore app, you can easily access your Nutstore from iPhone and iPad.


Features:

- Favorite folder for offline access
- View Office, PDF, Photos and Multimedia files directly.
- Smart file viewer: automatically save and restore file reading position.
- Cache opened files for offline access.
- Create and edit text file; automatically upload to the server after saving.
- Upload/Backup photos, videos and documents to Nutstore.
- Easily share files with friends.
- Easily access all your files in Nutstore.
author: Shanghai YiCun Network Tech Co.,  Ltd.
